The private bathrooms are equipped with heated showers and are stocked with complimentary toiletries and towels. Our dedicated staff is at your service with a 24-hour reception, ensuring round-the-clock security. Guests can indulge in unique cultural experiences, such as joining our canang sari class, tridatu bracelet-making class, farmer hat crafting class, and the traditional jamu-making class. Experience world-class service at Kelapa Retreat & Spa Escape to Kelapa Retreat & Spa, a hidden gem nestled in the serene beauty of West Bali. Our boutique beachfront resort offers a peaceful retreat for those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens and overlooking the pristine beach, Kelapa Retreat features spacious rooms with modern amenities and private outdoor showers. Indulge in personalized spa treatments, savor exquisite cuisine at our beachfront restaurant, and unwind by our two tranquil pools. Perfect for couples and honeymooners, Kelapa Retreat invites you to experience Bali in its purest form, away from the crowds and immersed in natural beauty. Important Notice For Our Guests! Before finalizing your booking with us at Kelapa Retreat & Spa, we want to provide you with essential information about our location. Kelapa Retreat & Spa is situated in the serene and picturesque region of West Bali, approximately 2.5 to 3 hours from the nearest airport, depending on traffic conditions beyond our control. Kelapa Retreat & Spa may not be suitable for guests looking for proximity to shopping centers or bustling tourist attractions. Our retreat is tailored for discerning travelers who appreciate seclusion, cultural immersion, and the natural beauty of a beachfront setting. If you resonate with the secluded and culturally immersive experience that Kelapa Retreat & Spa offers, we warmly welcome your booking. However, if this location does not align with your expectations, we kindly recommend exploring alternative accommodations better suited to your preferences. Thank you for your understanding and consideration. We look forward to providing you with an enriching and rejuvenating retreat experience amidst the serene landscapes of West Bali. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.6 for a one-person stay.

description: Experience the epitome of tropical luxury at Kresna By The Sea By Kresna Hospitality, strategically nestled in the heart of vibrant Seminyak, just 50 meters from the pristine beach. Enjoy the convenience of complimentary Wi-Fi, bicycle rentals, car rentals, and prompt room service, ensuring every guest experiences unparalleled comfort. Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Guests can enjoy activities such as rafting, mountain hiking, horse riding, trekking, and other day trips. Local museums, galleries, and markets are within easy reach from the property. Ubud Monkey Forest is 2.7 km from Amora Ubud Villas, while Elephant Cave is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International, 30 km from Amora Ubud Villas. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a one-person stay.

Each room includes a tea and coffee maker, minibar, and free WiFi. Exceptional Facilities: Guests enjoy a year-round outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, and lush garden. The resort features spa facilities, a restaurant, bar, and yoga classes. Free on-site parking and a 24-hour front desk enhance the stay. Prime Location: Located 44 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport, the resort is near attractions such as Goa Gajah (9 km) and Ubud Palace (10 km). Guests appreciate the scenic views and excellent service. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.4 for a one-person stay.

The cosy Kusuma Resort Seminyak is located in Seminyak, about 5 minutes' walk from Seminyak Beach. It has an outdoor pool, a restaurant and free WiFi in all areas. Rooms at The Kusuma Resort Seminyak feature a modern Balinese décor with dark wood furniture. They are air-conditioned and have private bathroom facilities. A minibar and a safe are also provided. The Sekar Restaurant serves both international and local food. Meals can be enjoyed at the restaurant or in the comfort of guests’ rooms. Kusuma Resort Seminyak is about 7 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport and 15 km from Denpasar City. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.3 for a one-person stay.

Guests enjoy a 24-hour front desk, paid shuttle service, and free on-site private parking. Comfortable Amenities: The property features air-conditioning, terrace, hot tub, balcony, private bathroom, and garden or pool views. hotelName: Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana
description: Experience world-class service at Tanah Gajah, a Resort by Hadiprana Tanah Gajah Ubud provides a relaxing getaway surrounded by rice fields. Located 3 km from central Ubud, it offers a 28-metre outdoor pool and free scheduled yoga classes. Morning rice-paddy trekking, accompanied by personal butlers, are also available. Spacious rooms comes with a private terrace and semi-outdoor bathroom. Amenities include a 32-inch flat-screen TV and Bose home theatre system. Some rooms feature a private pool with outdoor dining area. Tanah Gajah Ubud is a 1-hour drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport. Among the activities offered at the property, guests can join cooking classes or experience a unique hot air balloon ride. Other facilities include an organic farm and a gift shop. The hotel provides car rental, business services, and a 24-hour concierge. Free WiFi is provided throughout the resort. Overlooking Gunung Agung Volcano, The Tempayan and Panen Padi Lounge serves Indonesian and Western dishes prepared with fresh ingredients from the resort’s gardens. Cigars and drinks are available at The Bird Lounge, adjacent to Tanah Gajah Aviary. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.5 for a one-person stay.

Elegant Accommodation: Grün Canggu Garden in Canggu offers a guest house with a swimming pool, sun terrace, and lush garden. Guests enjoy free WiFi, ensuring connectivity during their stay. Comfortable Amenities: The property features private check-in and check-out, a paid shuttle service, concierge, housekeeping, electric vehicle charging, full-day security, bicycle parking, bike hire, and free on-site private parking. Prime Location: Located 19 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport, the guest house is near attractions such as Tanah Lot Temple (11 km) and Bali Museum (14 km). Guests appreciate the scenic views and proximity to nature. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.6 for a one-person stay.

hotelName: Kampung Uma Dawa Villas and Spa
description: Reliable info:Guests say the description and photos for this property are very accurate. Guests enjoy free WiFi, a restaurant, bar, and outdoor seating areas. Comfortable Amenities: The property features air-conditioning, private bathrooms, kitchen facilities, and family rooms. Additional amenities include a yoga studio, children's playground, and free on-site parking. Dining Experience: The family-friendly restaurant serves Chinese, British, Indonesian, and other cuisines. Breakfast options include continental, American, and Asian, with juice, cheese, and fruits. Prime Location: Located 40 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport, the villa is near attractions such as Goa Gajah (5 km) and Ubud Palace (8 km). Experience world-class service at Anapuri Villas Reliable info:Guests say the description and photos for this property are very accurate. Offering an outdoor pool and barbecue, Anapuri Villas is set in Ketewel in the Bali Region, 18 km from Kuta. There is a games room on site and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Ubud is 15 km from the property. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. Anapuri Villas also includes a spa centre, hot tub, and sauna. You can play table tennis, billiards and darts at the property, and the area is popular for golfing and horse riding. A number of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkeling, diving and fishing. Seminyak is 28 km from Anapuri Villas. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai, 25 km from Anapuri Villas, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

Set in the trendy Seminyak in the Bali Region, 200 metres from Petitenget Temple, Cicada Luxury Townhouses boasts a year-round outdoor pool and tropical garden with spacious sun terrace. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. Whether it is a studio, a suite, or a villa, the units in this property feature a modern design with elegant decor and furniture. All units are fitted with air-conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with extras such as bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. The staff will be available to help you at the 24-hour front desk with luggage storage or currency exchange. Room service is available at this property, which also serves breakfast in room and barbecue facilities upon request. Guests can arrange for a private massage. You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, snorkelling and diving. The resort also offers bike hire and free drop-off service within Seminyak area. Petitenget Beach is 400 metres from Cicada Luxury Townhouses, while The Seminyak Square Shopping Mall is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Ngurah Rai International Airport, 7 km from the property. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.0 for a one-person stay.

hotelName: The Sakala Resort Bali All Suites
description: Experience world-class service at The Sakala Resort Bali All Suites Located on the southeastern coast of Bali, The Sakala Resort Bali offers a luxurious escape with two expansive outdoor pools, a spa, fitness center, kids club, and several dining options – including an all-day beachfront restaurant, a specialty dining venue, and multiple bars. Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the property. Our all-suite accommodations seamlessly blend modern design with traditional Balinese elements. Each spacious, air-conditioned suite features wooden flooring, a kitchenette, dining area, and a cozy living space with plush seating. Suites are equipped with 42-inch flat-screen cable TVs and bath amenities. Although our rooms are not directly on the beach, The Sakala Beach Club – just across a small road – offers seamless access, with our security team assisting guests to cross. The Beach Club provides all-day dining with diverse international menus for lunch and dinner. Guests can unwind at the pool bar or lounge by the infinity pool, which overlooks the ocean. Twice a week, we host vibrant evening beach events, such as BBQ nights and Balinese extravaganzas (weather permitting). The beach area is outfitted with sun loungers, umbrellas, bean bags, and the newly opened Sakala Beach Bar, quickly becoming a guest favorite. While Tanjung Benoa Beach is renowned for watersports, our hotel offers an exclusive 2,000m² swimmable area safeguarded by buoys, ensuring a secure environment for guests. In the evenings, guests are invited to savor an unforgettable culinary experience at The Terrace, our signature restaurant. This elegant venue features curated menus celebrating the rich flavors of Royal Indonesian cuisine. For a more casual option, guests can visit our Lobby Bar at any time of day to enjoy cocktails or a glass of wine. By late afternoon, the bar comes to life with live music and the glow of fire torches reflecting on the pond, creating a magical atmosphere to unwind.

Situated on the white sands of Sanur Beach, Peneeda View Beach Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Denpasar City. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it offers a private beach area, restaurant and 4 outdoor pools. Rooms at Peneeda View are designed in a traditional Balinese style. Each room is equipped with a TV, fridge and safety deposit box. Private bathrooms come with hot and cold shower facilities. Guests can enjoy live entertainment at the music bar, or relax with a book from the library while enjoying the sea breeze. Peneeda Beach Hotel also provides massage services, a gift shop and a tour desk. Lambongan Restaurant serves local and Western specialities, while refreshments are available at the pool bar. More roadside dining options are a just a stroll away from the hotel. Peneeda View Beach Hotel is 25 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.2 for a one-person stay.

Additional amenities include a minimarket, fitness centre, and indoor play area. Dining Experience: Breakfast options include continental, American, full English/Irish, vegetarian, vegan, halal, and gluten-free. Prime Location: Located 10 km from Ngurah Rai International Airport, the property is near Seminyak Beach (1.7 km) and Petitenget Temple (17-minute walk). Other attractions include Kuta Square and Waterbom Bali. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.7 for a one-person stay.

Sevn Legian is 5 minutes’ walk from the traditional market and is 25 minutes’ drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport. Guests can enjoy various massages at the hotel. Other facilities include car rentals and airport transfers can be arranged through the hotel staff. The property also offers free on-site parking spaces for guests who drive. The Restaurant and Rooftop Bar serves Indonesian and western dishes at the hotel. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.0 for a one-person stay.

The elegant, en suite bathrooms provide shower facilities and free bath amenities. The Akmani Legian is located a 5-minute walk from Kuta Beach and Ground Zero Legian. Experience world-class service at MERUSAKA Nusa Dua Situated along the beachfront Nusa Dua, a 15-minute walk from Bali Collection, MERUSAKA Nusa Dua offers modern and elegant accommodation with free in-room WiFi access. It features an outdoor pool. The well appointed rooms here are air-conditioned and features a flat-screen satellite TV with English and Mandarin channels, a laptop safe, wardrobe and a seating area. There is also an electric kettle, a desk and a terrace. One-time non-alcoholic minibar is provided. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries including dental kit.Some rooms offer a convenient pool access while others overlook the lush garden view. Fresh towels and bed linens are provided in each room. The on-site restaurant is open for all day dining and serves a selection of Indonesian and Western cuisine. MERUSAKA Nusa Dua operates a 24-hour front desk that provides dry cleaning and laundry services. The concierge can assist with luggage storage, while day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Meeting and banquet facilities are available. Airport transfer along with vehicle rentals can also be arranged with additional charges. Guests can have relaxing treatments at the spa and wellness centre. The resort is a 20-minute drive from Pandawa Bach and a 25-minute drive from Bali Denpasar International Airport. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 9.1 for a one-person stay.

Enjoying a beachfront location on Legian Beach, the 4-star Legian Hotel offers a large pool and a variety of recreational activities. Legian Beach Hotels’s Indonesian restaurant provides local delicacies, while Mediterranean flavours are offered at the alfresco Gino's Pasta and Pizza Corner. Enjoy upbeat lounge music with light snacks at Ole Beach Bar located by the pool and overlooking Legian Beach. Water activities like surfing are provided at the hotel. Surrounded by tropical greenery, the property features rooms and villas with river and jungle views. Elegantly fitted with wooden interiors, each spacious bungalow has a dining area and a seating area with sofas. Amenities include a flat-screen cable TV and a personal safe. Guests can unwind with spa treatments and relaxing massages at SVA Spa. Staff at the 24 hour front desk can assist guests with laundry, dry cleaning or ironing services for an additional charge. Guests can enjoy international dishes at the Rasa Restaurant which features a Balinese setting. Alcoholic beverages can be enjoyed at the on site bar. Breakfast can also be delivered to guests' rooms. Room service is available. Kalapa Boutique Resort & Yoga is a 20-minute drive from Nirwana Bali Golf Course, while Ngurah Rai International Airport, Tanah Lot Temple and the picturesque rice fields in Jatiluwih are all an hour's drive away. description: Boasting 2 beachfront swimming pools, Puri Wirata Dive Resort and Spa Amed has an on-site PADI-certified dive centre with multi-lingual instructors. The on-site restaurant serves a daily breakfast, as well as local and Western dishes. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a one-person stay.

Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Hotel Tugu Bali Hotel Tugu Bali, part of Tugu Hotels & Restaurants, is designed to recount to the world the most romantic tales, folklores, and legends of Indonesia. Being the closest hotel to the Batu Bolong Beach and in the very heart of the hip village of Canggu, the hotel is steps away from the surf & sunset Batu Bolong beach, from all the best cafes, restaurants and boutiques of Canggu. However, stepping into Hotel Tugu Bali means leaving the hustle & bustle behind, and stepping into the true soul of Bali: timeless, surrounded by a vast collection of Balinese and Indonesian antiques & art pieces, together telling the beautiful stories of Bali’s rich history and culture. The CHSE Certified Hotel Tugu Bali offers an all suites luxury accommodation in the middle of Canggu. Nestled within private gardens, the hotel features an outdoor pool, an award winning Indonesian spa, and thematic restaurants that offers everything from Indonesian homecooking dishes, royal dining experiences of the past kingdoms, international fares as well as contemporary Japanese cuisine at the rooftop with ocean sunset view. Guests can choose to dine indoors, within the gardens or in any of the themed-dining spaces available as well. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Hotel Tugu Bali is about 30 minutes away from Tanah Lot and 50 minutes’ drive away from the airport. The air-conditioned suites at Hotel Tugu are all oversized, with Balinese & Javanese décor and wooden furnishings. Rooms come with TV, safe deposit box, mini bar with all organic array of coffee & tea from Tugu’s own plantation, the oldest coffee plantation Java. Some suites open up to views of the garden and have access to a private plunge pool, some suite with garden view and separate in-room spa area. All bathrooms are fitted with rain showers and oversized bathtubs. The hotel features Balinese and Javanese spa & wellbeing massages, beauty treatments and therapies that are based on centuries-old traditions and Balinese spirituality. A 24-hour front desk & concierge is always available for a variety of in-house or outside activities & tour arrangements. There are also the most beautiful Balinese dance and musical performances held every Thursday evening, a rare treat and the only one in Canggu/southwest Bali area. Show me more

Take everything available in Bali with a comfort stay at POP! Hotel Kuta Beach. POP! Hotel Kuta Beach offers numerous on-site facilities to satisfy even the most discerning guest. Never be out of touch with your contacts, with free Wi-Fi offered throughout your stay. If you need a ride from or to the airport, the hotel can arrange it before your check-in date. Taxi, car hire and shuttle services provided by the hotel make it easy to plan your day trips, sightseeing, and more around Bali. If you plan to arrive by car, you'll appreciate the hotel's free parking, right on-site. The hotel provides front desk services such as express check-in or check-out, luggage storage and safety deposit boxes for guests' convenience. If you need, the ticket service and tours can even help you book tickets and reservations at all the best shows and programs nearby. For lazy days and nights, in-room conveniences like daily housekeeping let you make the most of your room. Little things you forgot to pack aren't a big problem! Just stop by the convenience stores to get what you need. Please be advised that smoking is not allowed in the hotel to allow cleaner air for all guests. Smoking is limited to designated areas only, for the health and well-being of all guests and staff. Equipped with handy amenities, guestrooms at POP! Hotel Kuta Beach guarantee a comfortable stay for all travelers. Some rooms at POP! Hotel Kuta Beach are equipped with air conditioning for your convenience. In-room entertainment such as television and cable TV is provided for guests in some selected rooms. Knowing that bathroom amenities play an important role in increasing guests' satisfaction, the hotel provides toiletries and towels in some select rooms. Dining and things to do Nothing starts a morning better than a delicious breakfast, which you can always enjoy in-house at POP! Hotel Kuta Beach. Everyone loves a good cup of coffee! A coffee shop on-site means you can enjoy a cup of real, freshly brewed coffee every morning -- or anytime you feel like it. If you don't feel like going out to eat, you can always opt for the delicious dining options at the hotel. A night in at the hotel's bar can be as fun as a night out with your travel companions. Guests who prefer to make their own meals will love the in-house shared kitchen available here. Recreational facilities at POP! Hotel Kuta Beach are designed for escape and relaxation. Don't forget to explore the hotel's easily accessible beach. Start your vacation off right with a dip in the pool. Skip the dress code and opt for a casual cocktail or beer at the hotel's poolside bar. Have fun with your friends or family, or even meet new people at the shared lounge and TV area. Around the property Take advantage of the opportunity to explore Bali while in the city. Keep your vacation simple, with a visit to Kuta Beach just 720 m away, where the ocean breeze makes you instantly feel relaxed. Show me more

hotelName: Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan
description: Situated only minutes away from the Garuda Wisnu Kencana Cultural Park on the Jimbaran Hill, Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and a spa and wellness centre. The property is a 15-minute drive to Uluwatu Temple. Getting to Balangan Beach will take about 12 minutes by car and the well-known Jimbaran seafood restaurants spot is about a 6-minute drive away. Ngurah Rai International Airport is reachable within 20 minutes by car, and airport shuttle service is available at an additional cost. The rooms at Four Points by Sheraton Bali, Ungasan Hotel are all beautifully designed with accents of wood, air-conditioned, and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels, tea or coffee making facilities, and a personal safety box. The en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. There is also a seating area and some rooms have a balcony overlooking the pool, whilst others get to enjoy the city view. Guests can also enjoy sipping on cocktails at the rooftop lounge and bar, or indulging on relaxing massage at the spa and wellness centre. Meeting and banquet facilities are also available. As for dining option, the on-site restaurant serves delicious local and international dishes. Regular shuttle service to GWK Cultural Park.

Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.8 for a one-person stay.

The property also offers free shuttle service to Central Ubud area, free daily afternoon tea, free use of bicycles and activities like trekking, village walk, fruit carving, and many more. The Lokha Ubud Resort, Villas & SPA is a 25-minute drive from central Ubud and a 90-minute drive from Ngurah Rai International Airport. Offering views of Ubud's tropical terrain, each spacious unit tastefully blends contemporary designs with traditional Balinese touches. Amenities include a safe, refrigerated minibar and a flat-screen cable TV with DVD player, while the a lavish bathtub, overhead rain shower and a complete set of toiletries are included in each en suite bathroom. Leisurely afternoons can be spent enjoying a quiet read in the library or lounging by the pool, while kids can play in the kids' club. Guests can check emails in the business centre and make use of the meeting/banquet facilities. Airport transfers and vehicle rentals can be arranged for guests' travel needs. Experience world-class service at The Damai Reliable info:Guests say the description and photos for this property are very accurate. In the lush hills overlooking Bali's unspoilt North Coast, nestled among spice plantations, with views of Java’s distant volcanoes, you find a small, luxurious retreat with a special sense of calm. This is Bali as it used to be. Just 14 villas, an award-winning restaurant and a simple, but outstanding spa, and a special sense of calm. Welcome to The Damai. Hard to find, hard to leave. The villas are spacious and private, decorated with local antiques and beautiful hardwood furniture. letting you experience graceful tropical living with all modern conveniences, as if staying in the home of a friend. Some have private pool, some have not, all are set in a beautiful tropical garden, with views of the sea or the surrounding countryside. The restaurant serves an easy-to-enjoy tropical cuisine, that has been the subject of two bestselling cookbooks. Much of the produce comes from Damai’s own farm and gardens. On most nights the tables are set up by the bonfires around the pool, with views of fishermen’s lights on the Bali Sea. The spa offers a suite of treatments based on ancient Balinese traditions, as well as selected signature treatments incorporating Balinese healing rituals, letting you experience Balinese spirituality first hand. The Damai is 4 km from Lovina Beach and 80 km from Ngurah Rai Airport. Solo travellers particularly like the location — they rated it 8.8 for a one-person stay.
